text:
ActivityHero | Sunnyvale, CA | onsite/full-time Full-Stack Software Engineers Product Manager UX/Design

We're building a marketplace for summer camps & after-school classes. While helping parents, we also help the businesses behind these activities manage and grow their business through powerful SAS tools.

- We are Series A funded. - Equity & salary per experience. - Ruby on Rails stack -- but direct experience not required. - Looking for smart motivated engineers. - Small but growing engineering team

https://www.activityhero.com/jobs
